effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description:
Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 11.5 million damage and pulsing 567,732 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,764 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1.1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Blade of Encroaching Death

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 295,897 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 82,194 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
